alert.note: Alert for Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Iberville Parish through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayou Sorrel, or 11 miles southwest of Plaquemine, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bayou Sorrel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
